definition: Shanshang township in Tainan county 台南縣|台南县[Tai2 nan2 xian4], Taiwan
mountain/hill/anything that resembles a mountain/CL:座[zuo4]/bundled straw in which silkworms spin cocoons/gable
on top/upon/above/upper/previous/first (of multiple parts)/to climb/to get onto/to go up/to attend (class or university)
Shanshang township in Tainan county 台南縣|台南县[Tai2 nan2 xian4], Taiwan

sentences.english: Eg. The house on the hill overlooks the village.
sentences.chinese: 从小山上的房子可以俯视村庄。

sentences.english: But Chen Qingyang came down the hill looking for me again.
sentences.chinese: 可是陈清扬又从山上跑下来找我。

sentences.english: Bend at the knee when you ski downhill.
sentences.chinese: 你从山上往下滑雪时，要屈着膝。

sentences.english: We can hut on the mountain tonight.
sentences.chinese: 今晚我们可以住在山上的棚屋里。

sentences.english: My house is in the hills above Tiupllo, a very simple place.
sentences.chinese: 我的家在西班牙特普罗的山上，是个淳朴的地方。

sentences.english: The young man shot himself down from the hill.
sentences.chinese: 那个年轻人从山上冲下来。

sentences.english: Thirty-two white horses on a red hill.
sentences.chinese: 红山上，红山下，三十二匹白玉马。

sentences.english: The azure sky appeared to be so near and the clouds cast their shadows on the mountains.
sentences.chinese: 天很蓝，感觉很近，云在山上落下影子。

sentences.english: With that he skipped even higher up the mountain while the wolf loped disappointedly away.
sentences.chinese: 山羊说完就向山上更高的地方跳去，狼失望地跑了。

sentences.english: On the Monkey Mountain the monkeys frolicked and played happily, which attracted the eyes of many tourists.
sentences.chinese: 猴山上猴子们欢闹玩耍，吸引不少游客的目光。

sentences.english: Shadows on the hills, sketch the trees and the daffodils.
sentences.chinese: 山上的阴影，衬托出树和水仙的轮廓。

sentences.english: Whether it's over the hill time or just for fun this birthday ensemble is sure to please.
sentences.chinese: 不管是在山上还是玩票这个时候肯定请乐队生日。

sentences.english: It is a mountain filled with snow perennially .
sentences.chinese: 它是一座常年披著面纱的山，山上的雪终年不化。

sentences.english: One day, he saw a hare running down the hill.
sentences.chinese: 一天，他看见一只野兔从山上跑下来。

sentences.english: Located on a hill, a long escalator takes me up to what is actually only the ground floor.
sentences.chinese: 宝塔坐落在山上，长长的自动扶梯把我送到宝塔底层。

sentences.english: Tom said that he was going pot-holing in the mountain and I wished him joy.
sentences.chinese: 汤姆说他将去山上野餐，我希望他玩得高兴。

definition: halfway up a mountain/lit. waist of mountain
to go uphill/to spin cocoon (silkworms)/to pass away
mountain/hill/anything that resembles a mountain/CL:座[zuo4]/bundled straw in which silkworms spin cocoons/gable
Shulin city in New Taipei City 新北市[Xin1 bei3 shi4], Taiwan
covering the whole land/over hills and dales
